column10: Aiko and Takuma are positioned on a slope overlooking the hidden camp in the bamboo forest. Hayato, Yuki and Mugen arrive at the camp entrance.
EN
Kage-sama's hideout
What do you see, Takuma-sama?
Fire, at the heart of the camp.
I'd reckon that's where Kage-sama is.
I agree. Are the others in position?
column12: 同意。其他人是否已就位？

column10: Why did Aiko-san and Takuma-san go another way?
column12: 为什么爱子姐和琢磨师父要走那一边？

column10: We'll attack from two sides, circle in on him, then take him out.
column12: 这次要兵分两路将其包围，然后把他干掉。

column10: Remember that the Shogun wants Kage-sama delivered. We need to take him with us, whether he is alive or dead.
column12: 切记将军的命令，无论生死，我们都必须把影大人带回去。

column10: Dead's fine with me. Saves us trouble on the road.
column12: 杀了他更好，省得路上麻烦。

column10: Once we have incapacitated him we will carry him back here and leave this forest with our prize.
column12: 一旦将他拿下，要迅速带回这里，离开竹林确保胜利。

column10: Sneak inside, catch the shadow, sneak back out.
column12: 潜伏进去，抓住影子，悄悄出来。

column10: Teh, sound simple. Alright, let's finish this.
column12: 哼，很简单嘛。好了，开始行动吧。

column10: Mugen's group tackles the heavily guarded entrance to the camp
column12: Mugen's group tackles the heavily guarded entrance to the camp

column10: EN
What's this. Almost looks challenging …
column12: 前面什么情况。还算有点难度……

column10: Oh, a challenge!
Ha! These men do not know what they're up against.
column12: 哼！这些人还不知道他们的对手是谁。

column10: Mugen's group discovers civilians working in the camp.
column12: Mugen's group discovers civilians working in the camp.

column10: EN
Workers … slaves maybe?
column12: 有人在干活……或许是奴隶？

column10: Look! They don't have weapons …
Civilians, either enslaved or loyal to the enemy. We will deal with them later.
column12: 是平民，要么是奴隶要么是敌人同党。稍后再处理他们。

column10: Civilians carry wood and build walkways over swampy ground. Nearby guards push them on.
column12: Civilians carry wood and build walkways over swampy ground. Nearby guards push them on.

column10: EN
That's it, carry on.
No slacking!
We're not done yet.
Come on, faster.
Kage-sama wants these walkways finished.
column12: 影大人有令，赶紧铺好这些走道。

column10: You know what happens when Kage-sama is displeased.
column12: 你们知道影大人生气的后果。

column10: Hrgn …
Ugh … heavy …
... my back.
Civilians cut down bamboo trees to expand the hidden camp. Nearby guards push them on.
column12: Civilians cut down bamboo trees to expand the hidden camp. Nearby guards push them on.

column10: EN
You're too slow.
This is taking forever.
You call that a swing?
Faster, damn it.
Kage-sama won't be pleased.
Those who don't pull their weight will be executed. Kage-sama's orders.
column12: 影大人有令，谁敢偷懒立即处死。

column10: ... So tired.
Agh, my back.
Forgive us …
Mugen's group encounters stronger fortifications in the camp
column12: Mugen's group encounters stronger fortifications in the camp

column10: EN
Not bad. Small. Well hidden. No wonder no one ever found it.
column12: 还不赖，营地又小又隐蔽。难怪没人能发现这里。

column10: The camp may be small, but it's well defended.
column12: 这片营地虽小，但防备很足。

column10: This place … it's like a hidden Shinobi village!
column12: 这里真隐秘……就像忍者村一样！

column10: Teh … trust me: if it were, we'd be dead by now.
column12: 哼…如果真是忍者村，我们早就死透了。

column10: Mugen's group gets close enough to see Kage-sama (the fake one).
column12: Mugen's group gets close enough to see Kage-sama (the fake one).

column10: EN
That man in the centre ... guess that's Kage-sama.
column12: 中间那位……应该就是影大人。

column10: Look! The spider in his web! Kage-sama!
column12: 看啊！蜘蛛就坐在网中央！是影大人！

column10: Black clothes, like they were cut from shadow. Kage-sama truly lives up to his name.
column12: 一身黑衣，有如影子般漆黑。影大人果然人如其名。

column10: He's just sitting there, like a statue. Why is he doing that?
column12: 他怎么和神像一样，坐在那儿一动也不动？

column10: Doesn't matter. He won't be doing it for much longer.
column12: 管他的。反正他也快死了。

column10: Aiko climbs down to help Mugen's group.
column12: Aiko climbs down to help Mugen's group.

column10: EN
I shall go meet the others. I trust you'll watch over my descent.
column12: 我要去和他们会合。琢磨大师就在这儿掩护我们吧。

column10: Of course I will. Is something troubling you, Aiko-san?
column12: 交给我吧。不过你好像有些不安？

column10: Perhaps. I think there is more to this place than meets the eye.
Ah, caution. I understand. I will watch for anything unusual or out of place.
column12: 啊，我懂了。我会注意异常情况的。

column10: Thank you, Takuma-san.
Aiko lays eyes on Kage-sama (fake)
EN
The man who caused all this trouble. Quite disappointing, I must say. You have wasted enough of everyone's time.
column12: 始作俑者已近在眼前。真是可惜，就因为你，浪费了大家太多宝贵时间。

column10: Aiko reunites with Mugen's group.
EN
Hey …
Aiko-san!
I see you are doing well.
Ah, Aiko-san. I am glad you join me for this victory.
column12: 啊，爱子小姐！很高兴能和你一起迎接胜利。

column10: I cannot shake the feeling that not all is as it seems. Let us be cautious.
column12: 我总感觉事情没这么简单，大家要提高警惕。

column10: The fake Kage-sama meditates at the center of his camp.
column12: The fake Kage-sama meditates at the center of his camp.

column10: EN
Yes, the time is near.
A quiet moment.
Yet everything is in motion.
It is as it should be.
A life for a life.
All men choose their duty.
I have chosen mine.
When Kage-sama (fake) is attacked, enemies appear everywhere and capture the team.
column12: When Kage-sama (fake) is attacked, enemies appear everywhere and capture the team.

column10: EN
Now!
A trap!
Damn!
Wha–NO!
No, stay back!

column9: Fade to Black -->Fade to new scene
everyone has  been captured, including Takuma
column10: It is done, Kage-sama. The old man was on a slope nearby. They came alone, just like you said.
column12: 全抓住了，影大人。老头躲在附近的山坡上。正如您所料，他们一共来了五个人。

column10: Kage-sama … YOU!
… I remember my brother giving you this ... a remarkable weapon.
column12: 我还记得那天兄长赐予你这把刀的情景……

column10: Such a waste.
It makes no sense … how is this possible?!
column12: 怎么回事…为什么要这么做？！

column10: My brother and I disagree on so many things, Mugen. If you knew the extent of it, you would not be surprised.
column12: 将军和我之间的分歧实在太大，无限。如果你站在我的立场，也一定能够理解。

column10: Then what do you want, traitor?!
A great deal. Mugen, from you …
… I want to know where you hid Ryūnosuke.
column12: ……我想知道你把龙之介藏哪了。

column10: Do you think I would let you harm the heir to the Shogunate?!
column12: 哼，你真以为我会老老实实告诉你吗？！

column10: Of course not.
I know you, Ōshiro Mugen.
You are the most loyal man I have ever met.
column12: 你是我见过的最忠诚的部下。

column10: You would rather die than betray your precious Shogun.
column12: 你宁死也不会背叛将军的。

column10: But I wonder …
How far does your loyalty to my brother go?
column12: 你对我兄弟的忠心，能到什么程度？

column10: Far enough to sacrifice your friends …
column12: 高到可以牺牲掉这些人吗？

column10: … these people you are so proud of.
column12: 这些你引以为傲的战友……

column10: Would you rather watch them die …
column12: 你宁愿眼睁睁看着他们死去吗？

column10: Damn you! Damn you for all eternity!
The boy, Mugen. Or she will be the first to die.
column12: 回答我的问题。否则第一个死的就是她。

column10: … go ahead! I will face death with open eyes!
column12: 动手吧！我早已视死如归！

column10: Aiko-san!

column9: is hit by Masaru and thrown on the ground
column10: … agh!
Shut your mouth brat.
A decision, Mugen. It does not have to be like this.
column12: 好了，无限。你要怎么选，都取决于你。

column9: Mugen stands up guards take aim at the rest of the team
column10: … My name is Oshiro Mugen. I am samurai.
… A samurai must serve his lord …
… Protect his lord
… Die for his lord …
… But I cannot!
I cannot let my companions die!
No …
My Shogun, forgive me!
A wise choice Mugen.
Swear to me, on your life and the life of your son, that you will not harm my companions!
column12: 快发誓，用你和你儿子的性命发誓，不会对我的同伴下手！

column10: I will not touch them. On this you have my word.
… then … I yield … you have won …
Good. You will lead the way. Your friends will come with us.
column12: 好，你先去前面带路。你的同伴会和我一起赶上。

column10: Masaru, see that they are secured. They are not to be harmed, is that understood?
column12: 真申，看好他们。但不要对他们出手，明白吗？

column10: Yes, father ...
You, what are you waiting for?! Get to work.
column12: 你们还愣着干什么？赶紧干活。

column10: I knew something was wrong. I should have known better …
column12: 我就知道有蹊跷。要是能早点发现……

column10: It does not matter. Save your strength. Dark things lie ahead.
column12: 没用了，还是省省力气吧，黑暗即将来临。

column10: Mugen …
MISSION-WORDCOUNT EN:
